p: Dry cough: This symptom is present in intubated-ICU patients (45.6%), non-intubated-ICU patients (46.4%), non-ICU patients (33.7%), and healthy subjects (2.4%). It is increased in all patients compared to healthy subjects (p < 0.01). There is no significant difference between ICU patients (p > 0.01), but non-ICU patients show lower frequency than all others (p < 0.01). This symptom is more severe than all symptoms in all patient groups.
